Text: Presidential Polls To Interested Parties Fr Senator Jim Brulte Re Presidential Polls I thought this information might be of interest to you Governor Bush leads Al Gore in two of three national tracking polls Bush Gore VotercomBattleground Bush Gore Rasmussen Research Bush Gore CNNGallup Some historical perspective Battleground had the most accurate polls over the past two Presidential elections Their final preelection surveys predicted both races margin within a point of the actual outcome
